startForm.descSocialOne: You can connect your Google, Apple or Facebook account to log in to

userContact.headerP: Within the scope of the Consent Text, you can specify the methods you prefer to be informed about important campaigns.
userContact.smsP: Messages that will be sent to your mobile phone by Orion Innovation via SMS
userContact.epostaP: Messages will be sent to your e-mail address registered in your Orion Innovation account.
userContact.phoneCallP: Calls coming to your mobile phone from Orion Innovation via the search method
userContact.textP: Within the scope of your orders from Orion Innovation platforms; You can specify your preferred methods for conducting satisfaction surveys within the scope of the Information Text.
userContact.whatsappP: Messages will be sent via Whatsapp application to your mobile phone number registered in your Orion Innovation account.

userinfoForm.headerP: You can edit the information you need here so that we can keep your experience at Orion Innovation at the best level.
userinfoForm.contactHeaderP: We will ask you to verify your new email address before we can change this information.

userpassForm.infoP: Your password must contain at least one letter, number or special character. Additionally, your password must consist of at least 8 characters.
userpassForm.warnP: For your security, choose a password that does not include your name, surname and date of birth.
